post_detail.description:
Challenge: 
Headroom challenged ClickFireMedia to generate buzz for their brand with the creation of a branded entertainment video and website redesign.
Execution: 
HeadRoom is generating buzz with the creation of their latest viral video, Gene Marcus: Studio Whisperer and the launch of a sleek, new website. Introducing the character of Gene Marcus, HeadRoom's fictitious, unparalleled force of talent; Gene has an uncanny ability to climb inside your head and deliver your innermost musical and sound desires-- to unearth the extraordinary from sources you never could have imagined, never knew existed, never thought possible. Directed and co-written by ClickFire Media, Gene Marcus is a whimsical embodiment of all things HeadRoom. HeadRoom handles original music production, radio production, sound design, mix to pix, voice casting, music negotiation and licensing, among other services. Their sleek new website, courtesy of ClickFire Media, offers up an aesthetically dazzling and fun-to-navigate interface, while the warm welcoming colors of HeadRoom's own studio bring online visitors to a world in which they can linger.
post_detail.title: Headroom Audio
